Package sait.sll.utility

Class SLL

java.lang.Object
sait.sll.utility.SLL
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, LinkedListADT
public class SLL
extends java.lang.Object
implements LinkedListADT, java.io.Serializable
Author:
Mike, Ben, Liam, Robyn This class is the implementation of LinkedListADT. Is also serializable.
See Also:
